name: Normal Garden
description:
Controls :

WASD: Move 

Space : confirm\interact

Esc : Cancel\Menu

Due to how the engine is made it can get tricky to interact with the world. if you think you should be able to interact with something just take a step back.

Cover art by Leafy https://ieafy.weebly.com/

Music by Nekkosu https://soundcloud.com/nekkosu/sets/chao-resort-island-ost
